title: Diamond Team looking for  ambitious Players!

embed.title: Autistoteles - Summoner search results - League of Legends
embed.description: Autistoteles / Diamond 5 0LP / 235W 213L Win Ratio 52% / Ezreal - 60W 47L Win Ratio 56%, Vayne - 62W 43L Win Ratio 59%, Caitlyn - 47W 39L Win Ratio 55%, Jhin - 23W 33L Win Ratio 41%, Kalista - 25W 30L Win Ratio 45%

body:
Greetings!

We are looking for ambitious League players whom want to put effort, time and their competitive spirit into this game!
We expect you to have at least reached Diamond already. We are looking forward to play regularly during the weekdays and participate in Tournaments on the weekends. We obviously require you to have a decent microphone and the time needed to make this work! As voice comms we are using Discord, and we would prefer you to be atleast 18 years old and able to communicate in proper english.
If you are intrested in trying out you can add me in-game in the EUW region "Autistoteles" or leave a comment.
Please only add me if you are actually a Diamond Player!

A little bit about myself:
My Name is Leo
I'm 20 years old and from Germany
I hit Diamond 4 Last season playing ADC/Support.
I am a Diamond ADC Main right now, and will be playing the ADC role in the team.
I played with a Team before and participated in several tournaments and weekly League competitions.

We are looking forward to start Tryouts asap!
See you in the Summoner's Rift!

Best Regards,
Autistoteles!
